title: Hand Made Wooden Armoires and Wardrobes
description: The Cupboard is made of durable Veneered Engineered Wood that lasts longer and better withstands wear and tear, 600-pound weight limit.Frame & Floor Touch Material: Solid Mahogany Wood.Most of our furniture is made of natural components, which will have natural differences in grain construction and occasional minor blemish.

title: Hand Made Wooden Dining Table
description: The Dining table top is made high quality engineering wood and top noch lacquer finishing that reflects a classic texture of marble. This marble gives a perfect & premium look & ensure long lasting. Leg & Frame Material: Solid Mahogany Wood.

title: Modern Design Bed
description: A single bed for bachelor or a double bed for the couple - All are available here. Whether you crave a designer wooden bed or a minimalist one, beds need to strike the proper balance between style and luxury. Our beds are perfect for sleeping or when you both need more room to stretch. Some of our beds also have smart storage systems to keep extra pillows and quilts. And guests are always welcome to remain overnight, with our collection of sofa-beds
